alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; Livingston; Northwest St. Tammany; Southeast St. Tammany; Southern Tangipahoa; West Baton Rouge (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 02 at 2:35PM CST until January 03 at 10:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures lower than 32 expected. * WHERE...Portions of southeast and southern Mississippi and southeast Louisiana. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. The temperature at which pipes will burst will depend on the individual plumbing system.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; Livingston; Northwest St. Tammany; Southeast St. Tammany; Southern Tangipahoa; West Baton Rouge
